page.title: 06THE DAY OF AN INFANT CHILD.
page.content: I am 5. I go to Ryton Infants. My teacher does the register. We line up to go in the hall. We work in our sum books. We have milk in school. We get our coats and go out and play. We play Daleks. We write in our writing books then we draw pictures. I read to Mrs. Teal. We wash our hands and go into the hall. The other day we had fish and chips and mushy peas and apple pie with custard. I usually get seconds. We go out and play funny monster games. In school we play with our toys - "Lego",jigsaws,clay and plasticine. We sometimes paint and make things. At home time we have a story or a tape. We get our coats and get our mammy.
